tool_description: An API to fetch information about the space. Data is fetched from space.com.
name: SpaceFo
title: SpaceFo

api_list.name: Recent News
api_list.description: Fetch all recent news shown in [space.com/news](https://www.space.com/news) pages. The articles are gathered from all the 9 news pages
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spacefo.p.rapidapi.com/articles"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spacefo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://spacefo.p.rapidapi.com/articles"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spacefo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
